title: Elementalist Realm Definition File
description: A JSON schema for defining a realm for the Elementalist game

name.description: A name for the realm. This is displayed to the player.

description.description: A short description of the realm. This is displayed to the player.

biomes.description: A list of the biomes that appear in this realm. If not biomes are specified, the realm is assumed to be a single biome, and the biome will be random.

primaryElement.description: The primary element of the realm (for now this is limited to magic types)
